TITLE: Episode 58 - Political Survival Lessons from “The Hunt”
DESCRIPTION: Jessie is solo for this episode to discuss the underlying theme of the movie “The Hunt”. To sum the theme may be obvious but too many they will get lost in the stereotypical depictions of the characters. Watch the movie first if you don’t want spoilers.
